Owlhawk braced himself and put his hands in front of
him to absorb most of the shock of running into the
wall.  Then he stood up and faced them.

Owlhawk:  Verywell, I'm open to new techniques.

--- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote:
> The punch threw the female warrior far away. As she
> tried to get up, 
> she could not totally conceal her pain.
> 
> Katya: I applaud you, Owlhawk. You do have the
> Wolf's soul and the 
> Bear's strenght. You have bested me in this contest.
> We will work as 
> part of the Maximals as of now.
> 
> Ragnar's towering form came next to her.
> 
> Ragnar: You are a powerful warrior, Owlhawk, and I
> have been thinking. 
> I believe that you could serve the Maximals even
> better if we steep 
> you in the ways of the Clans. If Katya does not
> agree, I will be your 
> trainer. What say you?
> 
>
